root.name: Warmachine
root.description: GameplaySetup as a 3rd-person squad-based tactical action game, Warmachine will allow players to take control of various warcasters from all four of Warmachine's main factions:CygnarKhadorThe Protectorate of MenothCryxOnly one warcaster has been seen per-faction so far:Commander Coleman Stryker (Cygnar)Kommander Sorscha Kratikoff (Khador)High Exemplar Kreoss (Protectorate of Menoth)War Witch Deneghra (Cryx)Along with directly controlling the casters themselves, players will also have the ability to take direct control of an accompanying warjack rather than letting the AI control it.
